subdisciplines.name: Queer Film Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of LGBT+ representation in film and the impact of media on the queer community.

subdisciplines.name: Queer Performance Studies
subdisciplines.description: The study of queer identities and experiences as expressed through performance, including theatre, dance, and other forms of live art.

subdisciplines.name: Queer Literature
subdisciplines.description: The study of LGBT+ themes and experiences in literary works.
